alert.note: Alert for Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Lower Yampa River Basin; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 7:48PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of Delta, north central Montrose, northeastern Mesa, south central Garfield and south central Rio Blanco Counties through 830 PM MDT... At 748 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds associated with decaying thunderstorms along a line extending from 27 miles northwest of De Beque to 7 miles west of Collbran to 9 miles west of Cedaredge to 14 miles southwest of Delta. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rifle, Delta, Orchard City, Silt, Cedaredge, Olathe, Parachute, Hotchkiss, Collbran, De Beque, Mesa, Rio Blanco, Battlement Mesa, Molina, Austin, Skyway, Lazear, Cory, Plateau City and Grand Mesa. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 60 and 98. U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 61 and 82. Colorado 13 between mile markers 1 and 28. Colorado 65 between mile markers 1 and 52. Colorado 92 between mile markers 1 and 21. Colorado 133 between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
